channel.title: Shaking off the Rust
channel.description: Shaking off the Rust is a series of exercises with the Rust programing language. The purpose of the series is to improve both my and my dear reader’s abilities with Rust by building things.

content:encoded.p: Shaking off the Rust is a series of exercises with the Rust programing language. The purpose of the series is to improve both my and my dear reader’s abilities with Rust by building things. Plus, by actually building stuff, we'll learn about an array of technological concepts in the process. In this installment, we’re going to create our own Mandelbrot set.

item.title: Complex Numbers
item.description: Complex numbers are simple. Let's explore them with Rust.
item.dc:creator: Josh Taylor

content:encoded.p: Shaking off the Rust is a series of exercises with the Rust programing language. The purpose of the series is to improve both my and my dear reader’s abilities with Rust by building things. Plus, by actually building stuff, we'll learn about an array of technological concepts in the process. In this installment, we're going to dig into complex numbers.

item.title: Breadth First Search
item.description: You raise alpacas, and you want to find your closest LinkedIn connection that's in the market for a handsome young alpaca. We'll use Rust and Breadth First Search to figure it out.
item.dc:creator: Josh Taylor

content:encoded.p: Shaking off the Rust is a series of exercises with the Rust programing language. The purpose of the series is to improve both my and my dear reader’s abilities with Rust by building things. Plus, by actually building stuff, we'll learn about an array of technological concepts in the process. In this installment, we're going to perform breadth-first search.

item.title: DNA Analysis
item.description: Use Rust to count nucleotide frequencies, search DNA for codons, and much more. Real cool stuff.
item.dc:creator: Josh Taylor

content:encoded.p: Shaking off the Rust is a series of exercises with the Rust programing language. The purpose of the series is to improve both my and my dear reader’s abilities with Rust by building things. Plus, by actually building stuff, we'll learn about an array of technological concepts in the process. In this installment, we’re doing a bit of bioinformatics.

item.title: Naive Bayes
item.description: Using Rust and machine learning, we'll prevent our inbox from getting clogged with spam such as "Free Bitcoin viagra XXX christmas deals".
item.dc:creator: Josh Taylor

content:encoded.p: Shaking off the Rust is a series of exercises with the Rust programing language. The purpose of the series is to improve both my and my dear reader’s abilities with Rust by building things. Plus, by actually building stuff, we'll learn about an array of technological concepts in the process. In this installment, we’ll implement the Naive Bayes classifier.
